pros: good, nice, perfect, exaited, quality

pros: Working at Bronx Lenanon gives you options to gain experience in different departments. Some of the doctors are always eager to educate. Plus there is always overtime when needed or wanted.
cons: Always understaffed and most of the staff (pct's, housekeeping and security) are extremely underpaid in the ER. They work really hard and they are not compensated for all the hard work they do. The PCT's are under valued, disrespected and underpaid. Working here kind of feels like slavery. Doctors and management are rude and spends a lot of time putting people down and making them feel bad unless u r a favorite or have some type of kin relationship, smh. Unprofessional!!!!!!

pros: It was ideal to live and work in the Bronx. Lots of access to public transportation in the area. Also very nice parks not far from the building (Crotona park). Lots of food options. They celebrate Latin heritage month with food for employees.
cons:
The pay was one of the lowest in the city. As a part of the 1199 union salary was discussed and Bronx Lebanon came up short in many fields. Upper management pay was hefty. There is an article about the CEOs pay being one of the highest out of many other hospitals. 
It isn't a very nice neighborhood. Lots of crime. Coworkers were robbed leaving the facility.

pros: My supervisors and coworkers were wonderful to work with. The salary and benefits are excellent. Overall a relaxed work environment.
cons: The union is way too strong here. A lot of lazy workers that get away with a lot. Crazy lay offs and because the union is so strong, the hard working lowly men on the totem pole get the boot so seniors can take jobs they don't even want.

job_title: Administrative Assistant to Assistant Vice President in Bronx, NY
pros: The Fulton Psychiatry department is actually a great place to work. The staff is like a family and everyone works as a team. The AVP is genuine and reasonable and she works very hard.
cons: They do not pay well at all. The concourse division is a very hostile environment and they treat their workers horribly. No one appreciates anyone effort you put forth and they take advantage of you. They will work you like a slave and not pay you for it.

review_title: Good but can be a lot better
pros: On going new advancement technology wise, aggressive to push technology company to be the leader.   Many good visions and wonderful folks in the hospital.
cons: Little room for advancement and in some case the only way senior management leave is when they expired.  When management style, leadership is outdated, they get to hire 'consultant', spend/waste more on something they could find out/resolve from their own resources because leadership level conflicts.

job_title: Program Administrator in Massapequa Park, NY
pros: Encourage promotional activity especially with hard working staff members . Assist in pursuit of furthering education. Flexibility in anti-burnout activity.
cons: Lack of support on occasion. Administration is slow in filling open  positions and can overlook the importance of maintaining a full staff.

review_title: Great Hospital Management to Work With
pros: Most of the employees at Bronx-Lebanon are very nice.  Everyone is very helpful and are easy to work with.
cons: Hiring process can take up to more than a month.  It depends on paperwork needed, time to process, health review, etc. I had given my previous employer a 2 week notice and had to go without pay 3 weeks until HR could complete my paperwork.

pros: Job security, easy work and workplace flexibility. Friendly work environment.
cons: Where do I begin? Company culture - "it's not my responsibility", this can be heard when you call the operator. From management on down. Poor salaries and no benefits - this is run like a 3rd world organization. Top-tier management gets incredible bonuses and good salaries, everyone else is sub-par. Walking around hallways you will hear employees speaking other languages, which seems quite unprofessional. Poor benefits, no tuition reimbursement. No employee parking!

pros:
Is a Great Place, cozy and comfortable, bright colored atmosphere! if I were patient here myself I would love to come all the time with an Laboratory on the premises and get your results quicker. One fine Facility. 
My co-workers are cool and so down to earth love them (like family) I mean even the doctors.
cons: Have nothing other to say....

pros: Cordial employees, strong work ethics, good pay, benefit, and union. Good place to work for temporary or permanent. Good interpersonal relationship between patients and staffs.
cons: Improvement is very slow. Staffs are always short. Too many visitors and stay too late. A little disorganized environment ...

pros: I'm an hard workiworking person and follow rules and regulations of the company get along with my employees and a good person to know
